channel.title: Dragonholic Paid Chapters
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for paid chapters across mapped novels.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.nameextend: ***As clear as the sun at noonday***
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke’s mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital?

Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: “For hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke’s Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family’s daughters are no exception.”

Later… the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation’s goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated.

The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis’ mansion.

The third miss of the Bai family is this world’s second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds.

Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times.

On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city.

Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me?

Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood.

Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me?

Bai Qing Yan: …

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.nameextend: ***Sinking into the Depths of the Underworld Water, Can You See Love?***
item.description:
Ning Yao died tragically.
 The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body.
Ning Yao: “Thank you. I have waited for this day.”
Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart.
 One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars.
 She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him.
 Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened.
 Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia.
 How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply?
 But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan’s ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending.
 And Ning Yao’s lifelong wish is to ascend.
That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao:

“Yao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?”

“If you’re truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft—those fools don’t know his worth. He’s from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.”

“If it works, great. If not… well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.”

Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan:

If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill.

Slay one’s beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past.

A perfect outcome for both.

Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart’s scales.

Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails—desperately resisting his dragon instincts.

“Yao Yao, don’t come in…”

“I beg you… whatever you do, don’t come in…”

“It’ll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside…”

Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if we can both ascend, that’s better than neither of us ascending at all.

So, she went in.

Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness.

After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended.

She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her.

Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time.

Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple.

Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.

Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

Ning Yao: “Thank you. I have waited for this day.”
Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart.
 One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars.
 She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him.
 Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened.
 Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia.
 How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply?
 But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan’s ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending.
 And Ning Yao’s lifelong wish is to ascend.
That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao:

“Yao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?”

“If you’re truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft—those fools don’t know his worth. He’s from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.”

“If it works, great. If not… well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.”

Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan:

If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill.

Slay one’s beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past.

A perfect outcome for both.

Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart’s scales.

Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails—desperately resisting his dragon instincts.

“Yao Yao, don’t come in…”

“I beg you… whatever you do, don’t come in…”

“It’ll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside…”

Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if we can both ascend, that’s better than neither of us ascending at all.

So, she went in.

Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness.

After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended.

She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her.

Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time.

Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple.

Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.

Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description:
Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don’t go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position.

The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling’s protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body.

Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture…

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: It Was A Fake Marriage, But Jiu Qian Sui Took It Seriously
item.description:
OVERVIEW:

In her past life, Shen Qing Li married her cousin Jiang Zhi Li with a huge dowry left by her father. She thought her new family was kind, but they were all wolves in disguise, just wanting to take her family’s wealth. She not only helped her husband raise the son of his mistress, but the mistress openly moved into their home, took over her position, and even mistreated her child. In the end, both she and her child met a tragic end. In this life, Shen Qing Li firmly broke off the engagement with Jiang Zhi Li and decided to leave with her mother. However, her maternal family set up something unexpected.

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn’t help but criticize the green tea character.

Who would have expected that she’d black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed?

Lin Chu: “…”

Stay calm, don’t panic.

Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it in Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princess’s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other’s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
“I’ll go first…”
“I’ll head that way…”

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess’s maid and the second prince’s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: “What don’t you just go to the princess?”
Lu Wuyou endured: “I think the second prince is not bad either.”
Helan Ci: “If we keep talking, we’ll only end up hurting each other!”
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: “Then let it be a mutual destruction.”
Helan Ci: “…?”

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband’s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, “…Can you handle this?”
Lu Wuyou replied, “Even if I can’t, I have to. Who told me to marry you— I’m going to be a powerful minister. I can’t fall here.”
Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Sweet Kiss
item.description:
In the bustling city of Qinghui, Hengshan First High School is welcoming new students. Among them, Bai Tingzhou stands out for his remarkable achievements in the National High School Math Competition, which earns him a lot of attention. He was known as the “untouchable treasure” of Hengshan First High School and a favorite of the guidance director. He could only be admired from afar; many people tried to add him on WeChat but found that they couldn’t even find his account.

Meanwhile, the third-year students are stressed about their upcoming class placement exams. Xu Mu brings news of a new, beautiful transfer student, Li Yansui, who wants to join their top science class. This news stirs curiosity and excitement among the students, though Bai Tingzhou and his friend Qi Jinyang remain uninterested.

A playful confrontation between Qi Jinyang and Bai Tingzhou is interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wang and Li Yansui, who surprise Bai Tingzhou by revealing their past acquaintance.

A playful confrontation between Qi Jinyang and Bai Tingzhou is interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wang and Li Yansui, who surprise Bai Tingzhou by revealing their past acquaintance.

item.title: Sweet Kiss
item.description:
In the bustling city of Qinghui, Hengshan First High School is welcoming new students. Among them, Bai Tingzhou stands out for his remarkable achievements in the National High School Math Competition, which earns him a lot of attention. He was known as the “untouchable treasure” of Hengshan First High School and a favorite of the guidance director. He could only be admired from afar; many people tried to add him on WeChat but found that they couldn’t even find his account.

Meanwhile, the third-year students are stressed about their upcoming class placement exams. Xu Mu brings news of a new, beautiful transfer student, Li Yansui, who wants to join their top science class. This news stirs curiosity and excitement among the students, though Bai Tingzhou and his friend Qi Jinyang remain uninterested.

A playful confrontation between Qi Jinyang and Bai Tingzhou is interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wang and Li Yansui, who surprise Bai Tingzhou by revealing their past acquaintance.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description:
General Qi Ren, known as the “Mad Wolf” was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the “madman” harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yu’an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture.

However, after the wedding, Fu Yu’an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the “madman” climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yu’an kicked him off and exclaimed, “You’re not a fool?”

To which Qi Ren retorted, “And you’re not mute, are you? We’re both hiding our true selves—so why the disdain?”

“…”

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn’t help but criticize the green tea character.

Who would have expected that she’d black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed?

Lin Chu: “…”

Stay calm, don’t panic.

Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it in Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description:
Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don’t go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position.

The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling’s protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body.

Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture…

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description:
General Qi Ren, known as the “Mad Wolf” was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the “madman” harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yu’an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture.

However, after the wedding, Fu Yu’an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the “madman” climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yu’an kicked him off and exclaimed, “You’re not a fool?”

To which Qi Ren retorted, “And you’re not mute, are you? We’re both hiding our true selves—so why the disdain?”

“…”

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!”

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!”

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!”

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…”

Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

item.title: Sweet Hunting Ground [GB]
item.description:
Ani belongs to a nearly extinct species with unparalleled mimicry abilities.

In order to survive, she joins the infamous interstellar live-streamed hunting game, taking on the form of a seemingly ordinary human girl—wide-eyed, innocent, and sweetly smiling.

No one expects such a fragile-looking human to last more than three days.

Yet, as the months pass, the audience watches in growing horror. Not only has this delicate girl survived, but she has fought her way into the finals. The once-dominant warriors, who were the center of attention, now flinch at the mere mention of her name, instinctively retreating as if facing their natural predator.

——————————

Ani bears the heavy responsibility of continuing her species. She is the last of her kind.

To ensure her race’s survival, she must seek out the strongest and most exceptional beings across the universe to reproduce with.

While her opponents view her as an enemy in a life-or-death battle, Ani has already begun her own special hunt.

Within her hunting grounds, bl00d turns sweet, pain transforms into pleasure, and slaughter weaves an inescapable web of desire.

And those caught in her web? They become hers—completely.

——————————

At some point, the prey began to come to her willingly.

A man who was once formidable and battle-hardened, grasps her hand, and pressed it against his abdomen, willingly giving up his body for her to alter. He, who once struck fear across the battlefield, now stands before her with an almost desperate plea.

His voice is low, uncertain, yet filled with expectation.

“Ani… You will take responsibility right?”

——————————

Reader Advisory

[Suggestive Content Alert!]

•Technically not smut, but it’s not really suggested for U-18 either!!!

•Tentacle protagonist, male pregnancy.

•Niche themes, self-indulgent writing—proceed with caution if not your cup of tea.

To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.volume: Volume 2: A Blade Drawn on the Bowstring
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor’s chest: “Qung Qing is dead, what should I do?”
The new emperor kissed her: “You will be fine, just love me.”
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: “Qung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.”

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess’s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official’s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
——

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, “The king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,” before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: “Where is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?”

“… She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.”

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: “She said she won’t fight, so the fight is over?”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.nameextend: ***The family is broken and no longer exists***
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke’s mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital?

Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: “For hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke’s Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family’s daughters are no exception.”

Later… the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation’s goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated.

The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis’ mansion.

The third miss of the Bai family is this world’s second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds.

Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times.

On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city.

Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me?

Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood.

Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me?

Bai Qing Yan: …
